casebody.data:
U.S BANK, N.A. AS Successor TRUSTEE FOR BANK OF AMERICA as Trustee for Thornburg Mortgage Securities Trust 2007-3, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
David E. WALSH and Deborah Walsh, Defendants. M-782 September Term 2018
080694 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 21, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file an answering brief in opposition to defendants' motion for reconsideration is denied.
